educations.title: Postgraduate Diploma in Project Management
educations.organization: Academy of Business Professionals (ABP) | Dhaka, Bangladesh
educations.skill: Project management is the process of leading the work of a team to achieve all project goals within the given constraints. The primary constraints are scope, time, budget. The secondary challenge is to optimize the allocation of necessary inputs and apply them to meet pre-defined objectives.

educations.organization: SAIC Institute of Management and Technology (SIMT) | Bangladesh Technical Education Board

certifications.title: AI Engineering Bootcamp for Programmers
certifications.skill: Skills: Math for Machine Learning, Development Tools, Regression & Classification Models and Evaluation, Unsupervised Learning and Dimensionality Reduction, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, CNN, Model Finetuning, Transformers, NLP, Hugging Face Models, Prompt Engineering, N8N, LangChain, Multi-Agent System and Workflow Automation, RAG, Vector Databases

certifications.title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning Fundamental
certifications.skill: Skills: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Python (Programming Language)

certifications.title: API Authentication
certifications.skill: This course provides a comprehensive understanding of various authentication mechanisms and protocols used to secure APIs. You will learn about the principles of API security, explore different authentication strategies, and understand how to implement them effectively in real-world scenarios.

certifications.title: API Security Fundamentals
certifications.skill: The API Security Fundamentals course covers the core threats to APIs and challenges to prevent breach. The course includes modules on real-world API breaches, the OWASP API Security Top 10, the 3 Pillars of API Security (governance, testing and monitoring), and the application security technology landscape. The course provides strategic advice for developing secure API programs, and includes specific best practices for security and development teams.

workshops.title: Time and Stress Management for Resilience
workshops.skill: Through the 'Time and Stress Management for Resilience' workshop, I've honed my skills in strategic prioritization and proactive stress reduction. This training has empowered me to enhance productivity while maintaining a healthy work-life balance. I am now better equipped to handle pressure and approach challenges with a focused, resilient mindset.

workshops.title: ESET PROTECT On-Prem
workshops.skill: Proficient in cybersecurity with expertise in Security & Policy Management and advanced Threat Detection & Protection using ESET solutions. I am skilled at implementing robust security protocols to safeguard critical assets, ensuring a resilient defense against emerging cyber threats and enabling organizational progress.
